20110112021559.000|20110112021603.000|CC1|AND MORE POPULAR AND SALES      
20110112021603.000|20110112021607.000|CC1|NATURALLY INCREASED.            
20110112021607.000|20110112021608.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOLLOWING THE      
20110112021608.000|20110112021611.000|CC1|STORE'S OHAGI SUCCESS, SATO     
20110112021611.000|20110112021613.000|CC1|BEGAN FOCUSING ON SELLING ALL   
20110112021613.000|20110112021615.000|CC1|SORTS OF PREPARED FOODS.        
20110112021615.000|20110112021618.000|CC1|THE STORE HAS ABOUT 50 WORKERS. 
20110112021618.000|20110112021626.000|CC1|ABOUT 60% WORK IN THE KITCHEN.  
20110112021626.000|20110112021628.000|CC1|SUMI IS THE HEAD COOK, THE      
20110112021628.000|20110112021630.000|CC1|PRESIDENT'S WIFE, AND THE       
20110112021630.000|20110112021631.000|CC1|STORE'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.     
20110112021631.000|20110112021633.000|CC1|THE SUPERMARKET'S MOTTO IS      
20110112021633.000|20110112021635.000|CC1|OFFERING DELICIOUS FOODS MADE BY
20110112021635.000|20110112021639.000|CC1|HAND WITH CARE.                 
20110112021639.000|20110112021641.000|CC1|TO MAKE RAW GREENS CRISPIER,    
20110112021641.000|20110112021644.000|CC1|THEY'RE FIRST DRENCHED IN HOT   
20110112021644.000|20110112021650.000|CC1|WATER AND THEN RINSED IN COLD.  
20110112021650.000|20110112021653.000|CC1|THESE ARE CHUNKS OF RADISH.     
20110112021653.000|20110112021655.000|CC1|BROTH IS POURED OVER THEM       
20110112021655.000|20110112021657.000|CC1|CONTINUOUSLY FOR 30 MINUTES.    
20110112021657.000|20110112021659.000|CC1|THE DAIKON IS COOLED BY A PAN   
20110112021659.000|20110112021704.000|CC1|WHICH GIVES IT A RICHER FLAVOR. 
20110112021704.000|20110112021706.000|CC1|>> OUR PREMADE DISHES HAVE TO BE
20110112021706.000|20110112021709.000|CC1|BETTER THAN THOSE PREPARED AT   
20110112021709.000|20110112021710.000|CC1|HOME.                           
20110112021710.000|20110112021711.000|CC1|OTHERWISE, CUSTOMERS WON'T HAVE 
20110112021711.000|20110112021713.000|CC1|A REASON TO BUY THEM.           
20110112021713.000|20110112021718.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO DO A LOT OF          
20110112021718.000|20110112021718.000|CC1|EXPERIMENTING.                  
20110112021718.000|20110112021719.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE STORE CREATES  
20110112021719.000|20110112021722.000|CC1|NEW DISHES EVERY DAY BY USING   
20110112021722.000|20110112021723.000|CC1|SEASONAL INGREDIENTS TO KEEP    
20110112021723.000|20110112021726.000|CC1|CUSTOMERS COMING BACK.          
20110112021726.000|20110112021728.000|CC1|SURF CLAMS ARE IN SEASON AND THE
20110112021728.000|20110112021733.000|CC1|STORE IS OFFERING BOX LUNCHES   
20110112021733.000|20110112021734.000|CC1|FEATURING THEM.                 
20110112021734.000|20110112021736.000|CC1|TO MEET CUSTOMER DEMAND, THE    
20110112021736.000|20110112021738.000|CC1|STORE CARRIES 150 KINDS OF      
20110112021738.000|20110112021739.000|CC1|PREPARED DISHES, DESPITE THE    
20110112021739.000|20110112021741.000|CC1|TIME AND EFFORT INVOLVED IN     
20110112021741.000|20110112021742.000|CC1|MAKING THEM.                    
20110112021742.000|20110112021744.000|CC1|SALES OF PREPARED FOODS BRING IN
20110112021744.000|20110112021746.000|CC1|OVER HALF THE STORE'S TOTAL

20110112021748.000|20110112021751.000|CC1|FOODS ACCOUNT FOR LESS THAN 10% 
20110112021751.000|20110112021751.000|CC1|OF SALES.

20110112021758.000|20110112021758.000|CC1|PRICING.
